title: Name is outdated and childish... change please? <3
body:
My name was made quite a while ago when i first started playing.
I took a break, and grew up lol.
The name is childish and i was wondering if i could please get a name change :)

replies.body: You should still be able to purchase a name change through the store under client options, but definitely let me know if you can't find it for some reason.

let me know if theres any way you could help a poor boy out..
I will be forever grateful<3
You can use BE to purchase name changes. Just put the effort in, and you will get it without using real world currency.

Idk dude, I kinda like the visual of a mighty champion like Garen or Syndra being "slain" by burnt toast.
No... no, the flavor - it's too awful, they can't take it...! Syndra's such a drama queen anyway.

haha i had a better name in mind.. that contains no numbers ;)

was hoping someone could help <3
is there any way i can get a name change please<3

am a poor boy :c

if you cant help me then thats okay i guess

> [{quoted}](name=Burnttoast258,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oimBbKE5,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-13T05:02:47.509+0000)
>
> am a poor boy :c
> 
> if you cant help me then thats okay i guess

How do you expect someone do help you? You can't get a free name change lol. Just grind 13 900 BE or pay 1300 RP and there you go.
